SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, B.*, CZR.USERNAME ||' '|| CZR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME,TO_char(B.JYRQ,'yyyy-MM-dd') JYRQS, WHR.REALNAME WHR_REALNAME,JDS.JDMS JDS,JG.DPRTNAME DPRTNAME, WHDW.DPRTNAME WHDW_DRPTNAME, '飞机加油单编号:'||B.FJJYDBH || ' ' || (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION
FROM B_J_003_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.whbmid LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT JG ON JG.ID = B.DPRTCODE LEFT JOIN T_USER CZR ON CZR.ID = B.REC_CZRID LEFT JOIN D_012 JDS ON JDS.ID=B.JD WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from B_J_003_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj ) WHERE 2 >=RNO
